title: Generative AI-Supported Digital Multimodal Composition and Critical Thinking Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and experience in mathematical problem-solving
context.additional_context: A course for undergraduate students in medical, legal, and technical fields, emphasizing mathematical multimodal representation and critical analysis skills using generative AI.

learning_goals: Learners can critically evaluate mathematical diagrams/visualizations generated by generative AI and modify them according to their purpose.
Through collaborative learning, learners can analyze the validity of AI-generated content from multiple perspectives and derive improvement strategies.
Learners can apply systematic critical thinking strategies when integrating multimodal materials (text, graphics, AI-generated content, etc.) to explain mathematical concepts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
